title: Question Project Disruption
body: After the event ends..... Can I disenchant the items(blueprints,project cores..) for orange essence?

replies.body: Items like project cores should be disenchantable when the project disruption event ends.  This is detailed in our[ project disruption](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/210155266-PROJECT-DISRUPTION-FAQ) guide.  Hope that helps!
right now the event ends....and i cant disenchant them.

not sure which essence but you will be able to

Link: https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/210155266
